roleset.name: detect the presence of a specific antigen by the use of antibodies

role.descr: target of immunodetection, antigens/proteins checked for

example.name: Arg0
example.text: We immunodetected substantial amounts of pre-β-HDL in pBCEC-derived supernatants (Fig. 5).

example.name: Arg2
example.text: Only traces of D1 protein could be immunodetected from the membranes of the LC strain.
example.arg: from the membranes of the LC strain

example.name: Arg3
example.text: (Top, left) Ras-GTP was recovered with the GST-RBD of Raf-1 followed by immunodetection with anti-myc antibodies.
